acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill in POJOs which have a circular dependency
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldSupportCircularDependencies

tag.name: Basic types/Podam factory basic types test

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.pdm6.Parent
Then the Object should not be null
Then the child pojo should not be null
